name: James E. Heliotis
content: James Heliotis - Home Page James Heliotis Professor Emiritus of Computer Science Department of Computer Science Rochester Institute of Technology 102 Lomb Memorial Drive Rochester, New York 14623-5608 U.S.A. brief bio Information jehics©rit.edu I am retired. I currently do not maintain an office on campus. You may reach me via my email address above. Other Places on campus Computer Science Department page Software Engineering Program page RIT home page My Education Ph.D. - Computer Science University of Rochester M. Eng. - Electrical Engineering Cornell University B.S. - Engineering Cornell University rit_object and _types in Python Interests Biking/Hiking trails in the Rochester area. A Collection of Quotes Donald Knuth: ``Science is what we understand well enough to explain to a computer. Art is everything else we do.'' Axiome de Cann: `` Quand rien ne marche, il est recommandé de lire les instructions.'' Anonymous (sent to me by Richard Pattisi) `` In theory there is no difference between theory and practice, but not in practice.'' Peter Gutmann ``I've seen Sun monitors on fire off the side of the multimedia lab. I've seen NTU lights glitter in the dark near the Mail Gate. All these things will be lost in time, like the root partition last week. Time to die...'' Anais Nin: ``We do not see things as they are; we see them as we are..'' Pablo Picasso ``Los ordenadores son inutiles. Solo pueden darte respuestas.'' To RIT Computer Science home page After years of working with computers, I guess this sums up my feelings. Blasts From The Past
